projects.name: Battle Royale Plus
projects.description: Fun to play Web-Browser Based game Progress through the dungeon in this turn-based rpg simulation

experience.title: Senior Application Specialist
duties: Used New Relic Software to instrument monitoring and alerts across all frontend, backend applications, AWS Lambdas, and the whole AWS environment.
Created and deployed AWS Lambdas in Node.js using Serverless and AWS CDK.

Contributed to development and maintenance of GoFan frontend and backend applications using React, React Native, and Java Springboot, as well as supporting AWS components (S3, DynamoDB, Lambdas, and RDS database).
Invoked and deployed Artillery Load Test to AWS environment to test API's

experience.title: Freelance Software Engineer
duties: Developed a RESTful API using Java Spring and Ruby on Rails
Created unit tests using Junit for Java and Rspec for Ruby
Develop front end applications with HTML, CSS and Javascript.
Exposure to React/Redux, React Native, and Angular

experience.title: Technical Support Engineer
duties: Worked across teams to solve complex technical customer problems involving the Java and Python agents.
Supported New Relic customers by solving various installation, configuration, and data exploration requests.
Connected with our software engineering teams to resolve raised customer issues.
Advocate for our customers to our Product Organization by providing feedback on feature requests and bugs that could improve the customer experience of the New Relic platform.
Created test environments using different web frameworks (JBoss, Spring, Tomcat, Websphere, Django, Flask) to recreate errors for troubleshooting.
Participated in KCS to create customer facing documentation for common issues and fixes.

experience.title: Customer Service Representative - Geek Squad
duties: Assisted customers in troubleshooting home network, computer, and theater systems over the phone.
Followed through using process implementation to ensure all questions and issues are resolved.
Provided Geek Squad service recommendations if issue could not be fixed over the phone.
Updated database with relevant information regarding the customer and the issue they called in about.
